1.name: Broken Blossoms or The Yellow Man and the Girl
1.description: A frail waif, abused by her brutal boxer father in London's seedy Limehouse District, is befriended by a sensitive Chinese immigrant with tragic consequences.

2.name: Male and Female
2.description: Lady Mary Lasenby is a spoiled maiden who always gets her way until shipwrecked with her butler, then learns which qualities are really admirable in a person.

3.name: Anders als die Andern
3.description: Two male musicians fall in love, but blackmail and scandal makes the affair take a tragic turn.

4.name: J'accuse
4.description: The story of two men, one married, the other the lover of the other's wife, who meet in the trenches of the First World War, and how their tale becomes a microcosm for the horrors of war.

5.name: True Heart Susie
5.description: Susie, a plain young country girl, secretly loves a neighbor boy, William. She believes in him and sacrifices much of her own happiness to promote his own ambitions, all without his ...                See full summary »

6.name: Dalagang bukid
6.description: This is the first Filipino feature-length film made by a Filipino director regarded as "Father of Filipino Movies" and is now lost forever. Dalagang Bukid is a story about a young flower ...                See full summary »

7.name: Ravished Armenia
7.description: Aurora Mardiganian, a young and beautiful Armenian girl, lives with her parents in the Turkish city of Havpoul. Her father, a prosperous merchant, was preparing to send her to the West to ...                See full summary »

8.name: Anne of Green Gables
8.description: Anne Shirley, an orphan, is taken into the lives of a generous farmer and his sister. She grows from an adventuresome young lass into a charming and much sought-after young lady.

9.name: Daddy-Long-Legs
9.description: An orphan discovers that she has an anonymous benefactor who is willing to pay her college tuition, unaware he's the same man who has been romantically pursuing her.

10.name: Die Spinnen, 1. Teil - Der Goldene See
10.description: Kay Hoog finds a message that indicates that some Incas are still alive, but the secret organisation "Die Spinnen" wants the Incas' gold....

11.name: The Hoodlum
11.description: A spoiled young rich girl is forced by misfortune to fight for survival in the slums and alleys, where she becomes involved with all manner of unpleasantness.

12.name: Herr Arnes pengar
12.description: Three Scottish officers, including Sir Archi, murder Sir Arne and his household for a coffin filled with gold. The only survivor is Elsalill, who moves to relatives in Marstrand. There she ...                See full summary »

13.name: Harakiri
13.description: The Buddhist priest wants the Daughter of the Daimyo to become a priestess at the Forbidden Garden. The Daimyo thinks if he were in Europe that his daughter should decide on her own, but he...                See full summary »

14.name: Die Puppe
14.description: Because the Baron of Chanterelle wants to preserve his family line, he forces his timid nephew Lancelot to choose one of the village maidens to wed. Lancelot flees to a monastery to escape ...                See full summary »

15.name: Die Austernprinzessin
15.description: An American heiress seeks the hand of an impoverished German prince.

16.name: Madame DuBarry
16.description: The story of Madame DuBarry, the mistress of Louis XV of France, and her loves in the time of the French revolution.

17.name: Unheimliche Geschichten
17.description: A demon, a reaper, and the ghost of a prostitute read gothic short stories and act them out.

18.name: Blind Husbands
18.description: An Austrian officer sets out to seduce a neglected young wife.

19.name: Behind the Door
19.description: A German-American naval officer takes revenge against the German submarine commander who brutalized his wife.

20.name: Wagon Tracks
20.description: Buckskin Hamilton guides a wagon train across the wasteland, caring well for the pioneers he escorts, but hoping to solve the murder of his brother by one of the travellers.

21.name: The Lightning Raider
21.description: A beautiful young woman is a daring master thief. She meets the young millionaire Thomas Babbington Norton, while fleeing from the scene of her latest theft.

22.name: Back to God's Country
22.description: A woman finds herself all alone in a remote harbor with the man responsible for the murder of her father. With seemingly nobody around to protect her, she has to be resourceful.

23.name: The Mother and the Law
23.description: A re-edited version of the 'modern' story from Intolerance: Love's Struggle Throughout the Ages (1916).

24.name: The Grim Game
24.description: Jailed unjustly for a murder he did not commit, a young man uses his amazing powers of escape to free himself and pursue the actual killers, who hold his fiancée captive.

25.name: Don't Change Your Husband
25.description: Leila Porter comes to dislike her husband James, a glue king who is always eating onions and looking sloppy. But after she divorces him and marries two-timing playboy Schuyler Van Sutphen the now-reformed James looks pretty good.

26.name: When the Clouds Roll by
26.description: Psychiatrist Dr. Ulrich Metz attempts to drive Daniel Brown to suicide.

27.name: Præsidenten
27.description: The judge in a Danish town sees his illegitimate daughter facing a trial for the murder of her newborn child, and is rather sure that she will be sentenced to death. She became pregnant ...                See full summary »

29.name: The Lost Battalion
29.description: A battalion of the U.S. Army's 77th Division penetrates deep into the Argonne Forest of France during the First World War. The battalion becomes surrounded and holds out for six long days, ...                See full summary »

30.name: For Better, for Worse
30.description: Dr. Edward Meade and friend Richard Burton both love Sylvia Norcross. Both enlist in the military, but Meade stays back to care for deformed children. Sylvia thinks him a coward and marries...                See full summary »

32.name: The Greatest Question
32.description: An orphan girl is given shelter by a farm family, but soon finds herself in the clutches of a murderous farmer and his wife.

33.name: The Miracle Man
33.description: A gang of crooks evade the police by moving their operations to a small town. There the gang's leader encounters a faith healer and uses him to scam gullible public of funds for a supposed ...                See full summary »

34.name: El automóvil gris
34.description: A gang terrorizes Mexico City's high society on 1915. Murder, kidnaping and robbery are their trademarks. One police inspector (Cabrera) follows the gang crimes and eventually send them to ...                See full summary »

35.name: The Wicked Darling
35.description: A slum girl is forced to steal for a living. After she swipes a rich society's matron's necklace, she hides out at the home of a man who turns out to be the socialite's former fiance.

36.name: The Delicious Little Devil
36.description: A poor hat-check girl loses her job and is forced to get a job as a dancer at a roadhouse. There she falls in love with the son of a rich businessman. The boy's father, believing her to be ...                See full summary »

37.name: The First Men in the Moon
37.description: The inventor of a space sphere flies to the moon and is marooned by a crooked financier.

38.name: Ett farligt frieri
38.description: The farmer Knut Husaby has a daughter, Aslaug, who is the most beautiful girl in the village. Many boys are after her, but Knut and his two sons drive them away, if they come too close to ...                See full summary »

39.name: Kaliya Mardan
39.description: The playmates of Krishna are insulted by a female villager who splashes water on them. They take revenge by stealing butter from her house. When they are beaten up by the woman, they again ...                See full summary »

40.name: Nerven
40.description: Doubt and uncertainty ensue when the figurehead of a rebellion goes to court for an alleged rape.

42.name: Der Knabe in Blau
42.description: Thomas von Weerth lives as the last descendant of an aristocratic family in the decayed castle. He is fascinated by the picture, 'The Boy in Blue', which shows the so-called Death Emerald.

43.name: Over the Garden Wall
43.description: Peggy ( Bessie Love ) and her sister Frances ( Myrtle Reeves ) live with their father, but because of his idleness, they must all move to humbler quarters. Peggy adapts quickly to their new...                See full summary »

44.name: The Fall of Babylon
44.description: In the last days of ancient Babylon, a tomboyish mountain girl fights for her king when the city is attacked.

45.name: Der Herr der Liebe
45.description: Residing in a castle in the Carpathian Mountains, Hungarian nobleman Vasile Disecu becomes infatuated with Suzette, the daughter of his neighbor. He mistakes Stefana, a maid who is secretly in love with him.

46.name: The Sentimental Bloke
46.description: A down-at-heal ex-convict undergoes an epiphany as he experiences the love of a good woman for the first time.

47.name: Halbblut
47.description: The story of a man destroyed by love.

48.name: A Romance of Happy Valley
48.description: John Logan leaves his parents and sweetheart in bucolic Happy Valley to make his fortune in the city. Those he left behind become miserable and beleaguered in his absence, but after several...                See full summary »

49.name: Heart o' the Hills
49.description: Family tensions in the Kentucky hills are inflamed by an outsider's dishonest scheme to exploit the area for its coal.

50.name: Die Pest in Florenz
50.description: Suddenly appearing in Florence, an evil seductress causes Cesare, the city's ruler, and his son to both fall madly in love with her. The son, killing his father before an order to torture ...                See full summary »
